'''Amanda''' is a woman [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] thinks is [[Charles Bing|Chandler's father]] in "[[The One With Monica And Chandler's Wedding, Part 1]]". At Monica and Chandler's wedding rehearsal dinner, Rachel is told to talk to Chandler's father, and told he is "a man in a black dress". She mistakes Amanda for Charles and jokes about her name, thinking it means "A-man-duh!". Rachel is saved from any further awkwardness by Ross' speech.
